column4: Hello, i made a backup of my Home directory, and i just reformatted my drive and now i want to put that home directory back, do I just copy the contents back into the home folder?
yea... I assume you tared it up? just untar it back into the proper place
yeah i tarred it up, now will i have my firefox bookmarks back and such?
I think those are stored in your home dir, so yes
